mapper.select: SELECT r.*, u.display_name as userName, u.avatar_url as userAvatar, ri.id as img_id, ri.review_id as img_review_id, ri.image_url as img_image_url, ri.sort_order as img_sort_order, ri.created_at as img_created_at, ri.updated_at as img_updated_at FROM reviews r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN review_images ri ON r.id = ri.review_id WHERE r.restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC, ri.sort_order ASC
